courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Completion of campus Composition I general education requirement; completion of one course in a social science or consent of instructor.
description: Examines the historical, socio-economic, political, and moral dimensions associated with the rise of a global society and its governance. Prerequisite: Completion of campus Composition I general education requirement; completion of one course in a social science or consent of instructor.
label: Governing Globalization
sectionDegreeAttributes: Advanced Composition, and Social Sciences course.
